section.p: You are about to finish the creature off when it changes shape into a small, furry fellow with webbed hands and feet, and a thick, heavy tail. It drops to its knees, begging for mercy.
‘Wait!’ it cries. ‘Spare me and I will give you my treasure.’
‘In a sunken grotto beneath the river. I will go and fetch it, if it pleases you, my lord,’ it says, grovellingly.
